description: This table contains task information for Microbiology specimens and Anatomic Pathology cases.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TASK_TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the test that the task on the corresponding line applies to.

columns.name: TASK_C_NAME
columns.description:
The task category number for the specimen


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TASK_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The task action category number for the corresponding task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Aliquot Creation


Block Creation


Slide Creation


Media Plate Creation

columns.name: TASK_PARAMS
columns.description: Stores the parameters for the action associated with task on the corresponding line. For instance, this column may store the media type of the created container.

columns.name: TASK_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant when the task was completed.

columns.name: TASK_PERSON_ID
columns.description: The unique employee identifier of the person completing the task.

columns.name: TASK_LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the lab in which the task was completed.

columns.name: TASK_INST
columns.description: The user-editable instant when the task was completed.

columns.name: TASK_LINKED_CTNR_ID
columns.description: The unique container identifier that might be created if the action associated with the task on the corresponding line is to create a media plate, a block or a slide that is related to a block.

columns.name: TASK_GROUP
columns.description: This item is used to group tasks together. This feature is most commonly used to link multiple slides to a block.

columns.name: TASK_ACTION_QTY
columns.description: Stores the number of times the action associated with this task must be performed.

columns.name: TASK_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: Stores a charge associated with this task.

columns.name: TASK_CHARGE_QTY
columns.description: Stores the number of times the billing code associated with this task must be charged.

columns.name: TASK_INT_LAB_ID
columns.description: Used to indicate the lab tasks must be performed in. If a lab is listed in this item, the task will be added to the specimen only when the specimen (any container or test on the specimen) is received in the listed lab for the first time.

columns.name: TASK_LEVEL
columns.description: Stores number of levels.

columns.name: TASK_BLOCK_START_TM
columns.description: Stores the block fixation start time.

columns.name: TASK_BLOCK_END_TM
columns.description: Stores the block fixation end time.

columns.name: TASK_NOTES
columns.description: Stores any free text notes describing the task.

columns.name: TASK_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the related task has been soft-deleted. "Y" indicates that the task has been soft-deleted. "N" or an empty value indicates that the task has not been soft-deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TASK_AP_PART_ID
columns.description: Returns the part ID for this anatomic pathology task, such as "A1".

columns.name: TASK_PROTOCOL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the test which populated the associated task.

columns.name: TASK_COMP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the user indicated the task was completed in UTC.

columns.name: TASK_CHG_TR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The charge trigger status category ID for the task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Tech/No type charges have been triggered


Professional charges have been triggered


All types of charges have been triggered

columns.name: TASK_UPD_LINE
columns.description: The line in the tasks related table (SI 51310) that the current line is created to restore for when task was updated.

columns.name: TASK_UPD_ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique alert record identifier created when the task was updated.

columns.name: TEST_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated test on the specimen. Together with SPECIMEN_ID, this forms the foreign key to the SPEC_TEST_REL table.

columns.name: CHARGE_SS_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the last dropped charge for the associated specimen task.

columns.name: CHARGE_QTY_SS
columns.description: The quantity for the last dropped charge for the associated specimen task.
